snippet.title: Crowalt: Traces of the Lost Colony - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1269500

Coming to PC in 2021.

Crowalt: Traces of the Lost Colony is an adventure game that is merging the traditional storytelling with modern-day pixel art graphics. The story is inspired by the true story of the Roanoke Colony. 

A young adventurer travels to Crowalt where the first settled colony mysteriously disappeared 150 years ago. His only aim is to shed a light on this mystery.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/crowaltgame
